news.title: Brent Hinds, Former Singer-Guitarist in Mastodon, Killed in Motorcycle Crash
news.summary: Hinds, who was 51, was at the core of the metal band’s celebrated career until his recent departure

news.title: Jack White Responds to Trump Official Calling Him a “Washed-Up, Has-Been Loser”
news.summary: Steven Cheung, the White House communications director, was not happy that the White Stripes musician said the Oval Office now “looks like “a vulgar, gold leafed and gaudy, professional wrestler’s dressing room.” White pulled no punches in further criticizing the Trump administration.
